entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 11:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -21.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -24.7°C
Wind: NNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon then increasing to 50 gusting to 80. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain in the evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
